name: Real Estate Real Romance: San Francisco
name_original: Real Estate Real Romance: San Francisco
description:
Embark on a thrilling journey of career reinvention and love in "Real Estate Real Romance: San Francisco"! After a jaw-dropping career setback, join Emilia Whitmore as she dives headfirst into the glamorous world of real estate, selling opulent properties to the elite. This isn't your average game; it's a yuri dating sim and point-and-click adventure rolled into one!

Navigate the competitive real estate market, charm wealthy clients, and watch your bank account soar. But it's not just about closing deals; it's about opening your heart. Meet and date captivating women, each with their own unique stories and personalities. Can you balance love and success in the bustling backdrop of San Francisco?

Featuring stunning visuals, witty dialogue, and strategic decision-making, "Real Estate Real Romance: San Francisco" is a romantic escapade filled with humour, ambition, and the pursuit of a dream career and true love. Will Emilia find success in the city's skyline and, more importantly, discover the woman of her dreams? Take charge of Emilia's destiny, and let the adventure begin!

Featuring:

- Comedic and charming storyline
- Smooth Jazz Soundtrack
- Beautiful Anime style art
- Three endings
